1.0.1491.50: Applying an outfit preset to your current player model could cause problems with add-on peds because facial hair was not being overwritten.
That change has now been reverted. If you want to keep your facial hair when changing outfit presets, hold Shift while scrolling through the presets.
Old method of adding cigarette cards via spawning chests has been re-added, as the new method caused issues where the cards did not count toward progression.
You can now customize more parts of the trainer and additionally save custom themes as standalone theme files to RampageFiles\Themes
